90b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa'i mtshan mas yid mi gdung ste/ ji skad du/ don dam pa'i rig pa las/ gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag 'dud rtsi chu/ /gdung sel gsung ldan ngoms? par mi 'thung bar/ /de ni bstan bcos don mang mya ngam gyi/ /thang la skor
90b2(mdo 'grel): bas gdungs te shi bar zad/ /ces bshad de bskal pa dpag tu med par ngal bar byas kyang/ tha snyad nye bar sbyar ba de dag ni mi zad kyi che yongs su gtugs pa kho nar 'gyur bar zad do/ /de bas na bde mchog phyi ma las kyang/ rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor
90b3(mdo 'grel): de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol kun spangs te/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du don dam pa'i rigs pa las kyang/ /yul rnams 'grod cing gdung bas nyen byas kyang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i
90b4(mdo 'grel): cha tsam yang mi 'phrad ces bshad do/ /phung po dang khams dang skye mched la mkhas par yang rnal 'byor gyi mthus dus gcig nyid la 'gyur gyi/ de dag rim par bslabs pa las ni ma yin te/ ji skad du 'phags pa rdo rje gtsug gtor las/ de
90b5(mdo 'grel): las shes pa skye bar 'gyur/ /ma thos pa yang shes par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs la 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang/ tshig ni gzungs bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la/ snyan dngags dang ni bri ba rnams la mkhas zhes gsungs so/ /'di
90b6(mdo 'grel): dag kyang rnal 'byor gyi mthu las byung ba yin gyi/ rim gyis bslab pa'i gnas skabs ni ma yin no/ /chos mngon pa las kyang/ zad par shes pa zag bcas kyang zhes bstan no/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i gdung ba ni yid 'byung ba'i yan
90b7(mdo 'grel): lag las shes par bya'o/ /'di ni gdung ba bcad pa'i yan lag go /rnam pa thams cad du 'khor ba la yid ma byung bar bya sgoms pas byang bar byed nus pa ma yin pas/ de la yid 'byung bar bya ste/ ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la
91a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa las bshad/ thog mar zhi gnas btsal bya de yang ni/ /'jig rten chags pa med la mngon dags grub ces gsungs te/ 'dir gnyen la mngon par dga' zhing dgra la sdang bas chags pa dang/ nad med pa dang lang
91a2(mdo 'grel): tsho la chags pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis srid pa la chags pa dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa rnams spangs par bya ste/ ji skad du/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyi zhus pa las gsungs pa/ ri zhig
91a3(mdo 'grel): gcig na dgra yang mdza' bor gyur/ /mdza' bo yang ni dgrar yang 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar 'gyur/ /bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur/ /de bzhin mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig nas ni/ /blo gros ldan pas rnam yang
91a4(mdo 'grel): chags mi bya/ /gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyis rnam rtog dag /bzlog nas dge la ci bder bzhag par bya/ /zhes so/ /'phags pa nA gA rdzu nas kyang/ pha ni bu nyid ma ni chung ma nyid/ /skye bo dgrar gyur pa dag bshes nyid dang/ /bzlog pa nyid du
91a5(mdo 'grel): mchis pas de slad du/ /'khor ba dag la nges pa 'ga' ma mchis zhes bshad do/ /de bas na gnyen dang dgra dag la chags pa yongs su spang ngo/ /de bzhin du nad med mi rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/ /tshe ring mi rtag 'byor pa rtag ma yin/ /zhes
91a6(mdo 'grel): gsungs pas de dag la chags pa yang yongs su spang ngo/ /rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa yang spang ste/ ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las gsungs pa/ bdag ni rnyed mang
91a7(mdo 'grel): bkur sti byas/ /bdag la mang po dga' o zhes/ /'di 'dra'i snyems pa 'chang 'gyur na/ /'chi ba'i 'og tu 'jigs pa skye zhes pa dang/ /yang de nyid las/ rnyed pa dag ni mang byung zhing/ /grogs dang snyen pa byung gyur yang/ /rnyed dang grags pa'i
91b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs bcas te/ /gang du 'dod ba'i gtol med do/ /bdag la smod pa gzhan yod na/ /bstod pas bdag dgar ci zhig yod/ /bdag la bstod pa gzhan yod na/ /smod pas mi dgar ci zhig yod ces bshad la/ /yang de nyid las/ sems can rnyed?
91b2(mdo 'grel): pa med la smod/ /rnyed pa can la mi snyan sma/ /rang bzhin 'grogs dka' de dag gis/ /dga' ba ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhes bshad do/ /gzhan yang 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti nyes pa rab tu mang
91b3(mdo 'grel): po bstan pas de las shes par bya'o/ /'dir slob ma dang yang slob la sogs pa la chags pa ni snying rje'i bdag nyid ma yin nam/ ji ltar de spang bar rigs zhe na/ ma yin te gnas skabs ma yin pa'i snying rjes smad pa ste/ /mngon par
91b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa ma thob par slob ma yongs su smin par mi nus kyis/ rang 'ching bar zad do/ /ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa de nyid las/ gsungs pa/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu na/ /bdag
91b5(mdo 'grel): 'dri ngan pas smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang zhes so/ /yang de nyid las/ sems can rnams la tshogs byas na/ /yang dag nyid las kun nas sgrib/ /skyo ba'i sems kyang 'jig par byed/ /tha mar mya ngan gdung bar
91b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de la sems pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /che 'di don med 'da' bar 'gyur/ /rtag pa med pa'i mdza' bshes kyis/ /rtag pa'i chos kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /zhes bshad do/ /de bas na slob ma la sogs pa'i 'bras bus 'brel pa
91b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyi 'brel pa gnyis ka la snying rtse ba kho nas ma chags par dben par gnas par bya'o/ /srid pa la rang bzhin gyis chags pa yang spang bar bya'o/ /ji skad du/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las
92a1(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa/ 'jig rten stag dang sprul dang me 'dra bar/ /bsam nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya/ /bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ /sman dang glang chen brtag pa 'am skar ma'i dpyad/ /mtshon cha brtag
92a2(mdo 'grel): pa 'am rta dpyad rang bzo 'am/ /bstan bcos ngan pa slob cing klog pa spang/ zhes so/ /yang de nyid las/ glang chen rta dang bya gag bya khyi dang/ /gong mo sreg pa dur pa skyes pa dang/ /bud med bu mo byis par lug sogs/ /'thab mo 'gyed po blta
92a3(mdo 'grel): bar mi bya'o/ /sprul pa'i gtam dang rang dbang brten pa dang/ /dmag dang gyad dang na chung gtam dag dang/ /sgrung dang lde'u dang sngon gyi lo rgyus gtam/ /'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya/ /sngags pa sngags bzlas pa la brtson pa dang/
92a4(mdo 'grel): dbyar zla gsum ni gcig pur gnas par bya zhes 'byung ngo/ /de yang de nyid las/ las kyi dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang/ /mgon med rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig /lus kyi kha brgyud rjes su rab 'gro ba/ /de yi rjes su dge dang mi dge
92a5(mdo 'grel): 'brang/ /mtsho dang mdza' bshes dang ni rnam par 'bral/ /mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs/ /ngan pa skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal can/ /yul rnams kun tu song na'ang med pa yin/ /sha sbrang tsha grang bkres dang ngal la sogs/ /gang
92a6(mdo 'grel): du song yang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas/ /yul la mngon dga' i sems ni byung ba na/ /rnam rtog de dag rnams kyis bzlog par bya/ /'dod chags shas che mi gtsang sha tshil dang/ /lpags pa keng rus lta bas rnam par bzlog /byams dang snying rje chus
92a7(mdo 'grel): gdab zhe sdang dang/ /gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so/ zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa nA gA rdzu nas kyang/ /'jig rten gyi nyes pa du ma bstan nas/ ji ltar 'di ltar mi rtag bdag med de/ /skyabs med mgon med de slad du/ /'khor ba chu
92b1(mdo 'grel): shing snying po med pa la/ /mi mchog khyod kyis thugs ni 'byung bar mdzod ces bshad do/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang/ gzhon nu bdun la gdams pa dang/ bshes pa'i spring yig dang/ slob ma la spring ba la sogs pa'i gzhung la
92b2(mdo 'grel): brten te/ srid pa la rang bzhin gyis chags pa spang bar bya'o/ /'di ni yid 'byung bar bya ba'i yan lag go /de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan dran par bya ste/ de la 'dir yon tan ni gnyis te/ mthong ba'i chos la nyams su myong bar 'gyur
92b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ de las gzhan pa'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ lus bde bar gnas pa dang/ ngag bde bar gnas pa dang/ sems bde bar gnas pa dang/ chos skyong ba rnams dga' ba dang/ de yi mi lus thob pa don yod pa dang/ ston pa dang pha ma dang bla ma'i drin bsags pa
92b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mi ma yin pas mi tshugs pa dang/ nang nyung bar 'gyur ba dang/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'chi ba'i dus su 'gyod pa med pa dang/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa dang/ bza' ba dang btung ba dang gnas ma la dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang gos rnams
92b5(mdo 'grel): bde blag tu rnyed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang las la gnod pa byed pa ste/ 'di dag ni dang po'i yon tan yin no/ /gang 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang/ ngan song gsum spangs pa dang/ mi khom pa'i lhag ma spangs pa dang/ bud med du mi skye ba dang
92b6(mdo 'grel): dbang po rno ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ der yang ting nge 'dzin la dga' ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yon tan gnyis pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pas ni tshe byin gyis brlab pa dang/ lha'i gnas
92b7(mdo 'grel): su tse? 'di nyid la bgrod pa zhes bya'o/ /don 'di nyid las bsams te/ btsun pa zla bas rang gi slob ma'i phyir/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bas nye bar rgyan byas zhing/ /rked chings char chen sprin gyis 'khrigs par 'khyud gyur pa'i/ /ri rtse nags kyi mthongs der 
93a1(mdo 'grel): char pa med par ni/ /rlung ltar g.yo ba'i rang bzhin tshe gtugs bskal pa che/ /nags mthong ri dags rgyu ba'i tshogs kyis bsten byas pa/ /kun gnas bzang po de na skyid pa gang yin pa/ /de ci dga' ba'i gnas tshal lha mo'i nyams
93a2(mdo 'grel): phag tu/ /thil gyis phebs pa'i rdo leb can 'ang yod 'gyur ram/ /nags klung chu gtsang dogs bde dben par skyid pa gang/ /de ci lha yi bu mo dri zhim byug pa yi/ /lan bu'i rgyan du thogs pa rgyun ldan me tog tshogs/ /mdzes pas zil gnon lha yi chu
93a3(mdo 'grel): la'ang yod 'gyur ram/ /ri yul yangs pa skye bo lang long med par rab bde ba/ /nyes spyod rgya chen 'khor yug nags tshal sngon 'khrungs phreng bas sprengs/ /chu dogs snyan pa phu chu'i rgyun sgra rnga ltar snyan pa yis/ /bdag cag nyon mongs can gyi
93a4(mdo 'grel): yul ma yin zhes 'gron la sgrogs pa bzhin/ zhes bstan la/ slob dpon zhi ba lhas kyang/ nags na ri dags bya rnams dang/ /shing rnams mi snyan brjod mi byed/ /'grogs na bde ba de dag dang/ /nam zhig lhan cig bdag gnas 'gyur/ bdug?
93a5(mdo 'grel): gam lha khang stong pa 'am/ /ljon zhing drung du gnas bcas te/ /nam zhig rgyab tu mi lta zhing/ /chags pa med par 'gyur zhig gu/ /sa phyogs bdag gis bzung med pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni yangs rnams su/ /rang dbang spyod cing chags med par//
93a6(mdo 'grel): nam zhig bdag ni gnas par 'gyur/ /lhung bzed la sogs nyid tshe dang/ /kun la mi kho'i gos 'chang zhing/ /lus 'di spa ba ma byas kyang/ /'jig med gnas par nam zhig 'gyur/ /dur khrod song nas gzhan dag gi /rus go dag dang bdag gi
93a7(mdo 'grel): lus/ /'jig pa'i chos can dag tu ni/ /nam zhig mgo snyoms byed par 'gyur/ zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma la sogs pa'i mdo rnams las ting nge 'dzin gyi phan yon rgya cher shes par bya'o/ /'di ni yon tan rjes su dran pas
93b1(mdo 'grel): spros pa'i yan lag go /de ltar yon tan mthong nas spro bar gyur pa des gnyen po yid la bya bas rab tu spro bar bya ste/ ji skad du/ byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ de ltar bzod pas brtson 'grus rtsom/ /'di ltar brtson la byang chub gnas
93b2(mdo 'grel): rlung med g.yo ba med pa bzhin/ /bsod nams brtson 'grus med mi 'byung/ /zhes bstan pa lta bu'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis rab tu brtson pas 'dod pa'i don ma bsgrubs na/ tshe 'di ni rab tu g.yo ba yin pas/ yid brtan par bya ba'i nus pa med pas skad
93b3(mdo 'grel): cig tsam yang g.yel bar mi bya'o/ /snyam du yid la bya ste/ don 'di nyid thugs la gzhag nas/ 'phags pa nA gA rdzu na'i zhal snga nas/ tshe 'di gnod mad rlung gis btab pa yi/ /chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rdub gnyid
93b4(mdo 'grel): kyis log pa la/ /sad khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che zhes pa dang/ yang mgo 'am gos la glo bur med yod na/ /de dag phyir zlog bgyi ba btang nas kyang/ /yang sred med par bgyi slad 'bad 'tshal te/ /'di bas ches mchog dgos pa gzhan ma
93b5(mdo 'grel): mchis/ /zhes rgyal po mthar 'gro gzhon gyi phyir gdams pa bya'o/ /bcun pa zla bas kyang rang gi slob ma la 'di skad du/ mi yi dngos po shin tu rnyed gyur nas/ /don du brnag pa gang yin de nyid brtun de bsgrubs/ /mar me me lce shugs drag rlung gis bskyod pa
93b6(mdo 'grel): lta'o/ /tshe ni skad cig gnas pa'i gded yang yod ma yin/ /'di ni sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya/ /'di ni de re'u bya zhes skye bo sems pa na/ /gshin rje be con nag thogs zur gyis lta ba yi/ /mig rtsa dmar khros ma rangs gdams re snyam 'debs/ /so ga
93b7(mdo 'grel): me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di 'byung par 'gyur/ /zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i sngon dus 'di 'byung zhes/ /skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tsho 'di ni/ /zad par 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dgar 'gyur ba med ces gdams so/ /slob dpon zhi ba
94a1(mdo 'grel): lha'i zhal snga nas kyang/ yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/ /byas dang ma byas mi sdod pas/ /na dang mi na kun gyis kyang/ /glo bur tshe la yid mi brtan zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin du dpal dag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i zhal snga
94a2(mdo 'grel): nas kyang/ 'di bya nad par slar yang 'di bya de nas gzhan yang 'di bya zhes/ /srid pa g.yo ba'i rang bzhin ma shes don med yid brtan tshol byed pa'i/ /skye dgu mchi bdag khar ni chu srin kha ru gru ni zhugs pa ltar/ /bya ba ma phyin par ni yul gyi chu yi dpa' 
94a3(mdo 'grel): glong nang du lhung zhes bshad do/ /de bzhin du slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas kyang/ de ring de bzhin du ni sad snyam pa'i/ /skyes bu nor rnams phun sum tshogs 'dod pa'i/ /snyim pa chu yis bkang pa 'dzag pa bzhin/ /mi mngon 'dra'o kwa ye bzhin bzangs
94a4(mdo 'grel): rnams zhes bstan to/ /'di ni gnyen po yid la bya bas brtson par bya ba'i yan lag go /de ltar rab tu brtson pa nges yan lag gnyis zung du 'brel par bya ste/ 'di ltar zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang/ thabs dang shes rab bo ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi gnas
94a5(mdo 'grel): kyis brtan po nyid ma byas pa'i lhag mthong ni brtan par mi gnas te/ mar me dang rlung bzhin no/ /lhag mthong dang bral ba'i zhi gnas kyis ni/ /sgrib pa'i dra ba rnams ma lus par byang bar mi nus te/ ji ltar gzugs med pa la sogs pa'i zhi gnas
94a6(mdo 'grel): slar 'khor ba lta bu'o/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ zhi gnas rab tu ldan pa'i lhag mthong gis/ /nyon mongs rnam par 'joms par shes byas nas/ /thog mar zhi gnas btsal byed yang ni/ /'jig rten chags pa med
94a7(mdo 'grel): pa med la mngon dags 'gyur ces bshad do/ /de bzhin du thabs dang shes rab kyang ste/ ji ltar zhe na/ sku rnam pa gnyis grub par bya ba yin pa dang/ sgrib pa gnyis spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de bas 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang/
94b1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa ga ya go ri'i mdo las/ thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab ni 'chid ba'o/ /shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs kyang 'chid ba'i zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las/ smon lam mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes
94b2(mdo 'grel): khong du chud pa ni mngon par mi 'grub pa'i bdud do/ /bdud bcu las gcig tu gsungs so/ /ci'i phyir stong pa nyid kho nas de dag mi 'grub ce na/ ma yin te/ 'bras bu ni rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro/ /de bas na 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa/
94b3(mdo 'grel): smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung/ /chos gcig gis ni byung ba med/ /gang yang byung ba yod ma yin/ /'byung bar 'gyur pa de bzhin med ces so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa rdo rje'i dra ba las kyang/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /rgyu las
94b4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gzhan med phyir/ /thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin zhes gsungs so/ /'o na ci'i phyir lung las stong pa 'ba' zhig bsgom pas chog par gsungs zhe na/ 'di ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar 'jug pa de dag gi phyir stong pa nyid kyi che
94b5(mdo 'grel): ba bstan pa ste/ de ltar yang 'phags pa rdo rje dra ba de nyid las/ lta ba rnam pas log rnams dang/ /bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyis/ /bdag du 'dzin par zlog pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis stong pa bstan/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes/ /thabs bde ba
94b6(mdo 'grel): yi sdom pa ste/ /sangs rgyas pa rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid yul mi ring 'gyur/ /zhes stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig mi bsten gyi/ /lha'i sku bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la ni stong pa nyid snying rje'i snying po can
94b7(mdo 'grel): bsgom gyi stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig ma yin no/ /lung dag ni dgongs pa dang ldan pa ste/ ji ltar manDal phul ba las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug thob par bstan pa lta bu ste/ de bas na lung la sgra ji bzhin par mi gzung ste/ 'on kyang stong pa nyid la goms pa phul du phyin
95a1(mdo 'grel): pa na dge ba'i las thams cad rang gi dang las 'byung ste/ dang por sems can gyi don gyi phyir stong pa nyid la zhugs pa nas/ nyan thos ltar zhi ba nyid du mi 'gyur te/ ji tsam du stong pa nyid brtan pa de tsam du sems can de ltar
95a2(mdo 'grel): ma rtogs pa rnams la snying rje skye ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa nA gArdzu na'i zhal snga nas bshad pa/ de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ /stong nyid 'di ni bsgom byas na/ /blo ni gzhan don la dga' bar/ /'gyur ba nyid du dogs pa med ces so/ /gzhan yang chos
95a3(mdo 'grel): la bdag med mkhas pa ni/ /rang bzhin med la goms byas pas/ /phyin ci log las byung ba yi/ /nyon mongs bsgrim pa med par spong zhes dbu ma'i rgyan las bshad pa'i rigs pa nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur te/ gang gi snying rje yang ma spangs la/
95a4(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa yang zhi ba de la ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan rnams tshegs med par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bas na rgyu'i gtso bor 'gyur ba dang/ de 'ba' zhig las kyang yon tan mang po 'byung ba la dgongs te/ 'phags
95a5(mdo 'grel): pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa las/ mtshan mar bcas pa mtshan bcas kyis/ /dngos grub dam pa rgyal bas bzhed/ /mtshan ma med la gnas pas ni/ /mtshan mar bcas pa'ang 'gyur du rung/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad
95a6(mdo 'grel): du/ mtshan ma med pa bsten par bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig gis chog par gsungs pa nyid do/ /'di ni 'brel par bya ba'i yan lag go /de ltar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa des gnas rjes su mthun par kha
95a7(mdo 'grel): zas dang spyod lam dang rjes su mthun pa dang/ gos dang grogs rjes su mthun pa dang ldan par byas la sems mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /de la rjes su mthun pa'i gnas ni/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyi zhus pa las gsungs pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang bde
95b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs nyid skyes dang/ /rgyal ba sngon chad gang na bzhugs pa yi/ gnas gang bsod nams ldan zhing dga' ba yi/ /lha dang lha min la sogs phyag 'tshal mchod/ /gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis/ /bdag nyid dag par bya phyir bsten bya ba/ /de
95b2(mdo 'grel): lta bu ni ma rnyed gzhan yang ni/ /chu bo chu klung 'bab chu yod pa dang/ /pad+ma utpa las ni brgyan pa'i mtsho/ /skye bo rnams ni shin tu mi rgyu ba/ /dang zhing zhim pa'i chu ni mang ba dang/ /mi bzad gdon rnams kyang ni mi gnas pa/ /me tog 'bras bu gnang?
95b3(mdo 'grel): ma yod pa dang/ /sman ljongs ljon shing sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang/ /sa stengs gnas mal shin tu gcang ba dang/ /gang na stag gzig seng ge med pa dang/ /yid 'ong mnyam zhing tsher ma med pa dang/ /mi yi dngos grub gnas su bsgrags pa yin//
95b4(mdo 'grel): grogs po grog mkhar thal ba skra bshad dang/ /nyal nyil sol ba tshe sgo tshogs bcas spang?/ /der ni sa brkos sbyangs nas gnas brtsig pa/ /dro la brtan zhing 'jim pas zhal zhal bya/ /shar ram byang ngam nub tu sgo gdod cing/ /lho phyogs su ni nam
95b5(mdo 'grel): yang sgo mi gdod ces gsungs te/ 'di ni rjes su mthun pa'i gnas so/ /kha zas kyang rjes su chags pa med pa dang/ tshod zin pa dang/ lus kyi stobs dang 'tsham pa de ltar bza' ste/ de bas na 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ kha zas sman dang 'dra
95b6(mdo 'grel): bar rigs pa yis/ /'dod chags zhe sdang med par bsten bgyi ste/ /rgyags phyir ma lags snyems pa'i phyir ma lags/ /'chag phyir ma lags lus gnas 'ba' zhig phyir/ /zhes bshad do/ /chags par gyur pa'i nyes pa ni/ ji skad du/ 'phags
95b7(mdo 'grel): pa gang pos zhus pa las gsungs pa/ zhim po'i ro la zhen cing chags/ /skyon rnams mthong bar ma gyur pas/ /bdud kyis glags ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /mchil pas bzung ba'i nya bzhin no zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus
96a1(mdo 'grel): pa las kyang/ dper na rma yi gso dang bsal ba'i phyir/ /nad pa dag la sman ni sbyin pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal dag /bsal phyir rgyal bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs/ /la la lam gyi dub cing? 'gro
96a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe/ /bkres skom gdungs pas rang gi bu yi sha/ /za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor sems dman zhing/ /'tshe dar rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o/ /mang du blugs pas rtsol med mtho ba la/ /de bzhin nyung ngus srang ni dma''gyur la/ /ran pas skad cig mnyam
96a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gro ba ltar/ /lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya/ /dper na khang ba snying mi zhig bya ba'i phyir/ /mi yis ka ba bzang po 'dzugs pa ltar/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang/ /shing rta'i mig skud bzhin du kha zas bza' / /'dod
96a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i khams ni kha zas kyis gnas zhes/ /rgyal bas chos gcig tu ni bka' stsal ba/ lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig bya ste/ /sems ni bza' btung sogs la chags mi bya zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du lus kyi nyams dma' ba ltar na
96a5(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis kyang bsnyung bar gnas par mi bya ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las byang chub du gsungs pa/ dub par gyur ba'i skyon yod phyir/ /bsnyung bar gnas pa smad par bshad ces so/ /gal te lus
96a6(mdo 'grel): la dub pa med pa lta na ni lus yang bar bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis kyang bsnyung bar gnas par bya ste/ ji skad du/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las/ bu gcig lus dag bya phyir bsnyung bya zhes/ /bde bar gshegs pa
96a7(mdo 'grel): nam yang mi gsung yang/ /lus 'di mi gtsang pags pa sha khrag rkang/ /klad rgyas rgyu ma mcher mchin mkhal ma zhag /mkhris pa bad kan khu chu phyis dpag cin snabs ba spu skra dang rus pa dang/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang kha dang ni/ /bshang sgo mtshan ma
96b1(mdo 'grel): bu ga dgu po yi/ /rma nas dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba/ /'dzag pa'i rgyun ni rtag tu 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar yan lag thams cad 'dus pa dang/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang ldan/ /ci bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lus/ /thams cad ldan pa'i
96b2(mdo 'grel): gzugs la gnas pa yi/ /bshang gci rnams dang mchil ma bad kan dang/ /'di dag zad par bya phyir bsnyung bar gsungs/ /dri ma zad nas mi yi lus dag na/ /rang gi 'byor phyir sgrub la 'bad par bya ces gsungs so/ grogs po ni med pa 'am rjes su
96b3(mdo 'grel): mthun pa bsten te/ ji skad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde de dang de dag las gsungs pa/ mang po dag ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /gnyis po dag ni gtam bcas 'gyur/ /gzhon nu ma yi gdub bu bzhin/ /gcig pu zhig ni gnas par bya zhes so/ /rjes su
96b4(mdo 'grel): mthun pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs pa nam yang 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing rta ni/ /rta dang ldan yang lam du mi 'gro ltar/ /de bzhin sgrub pa po na grags med na/ /lus can dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni khro ldan gzugs bzangs
96b5(mdo 'grel): gtsang sbra che/ /rigs ni btsun zhing chos la gzhol ba dang/ /spobs pa che la dpa' zhing dbang po thul/ /snyan par smra zhing sbyin phod snying rje can/ /bkres dang skom dang nyon mongs bzod pa dang/ /bram ze dang ni lha gzhan mchod mi byed/ /sgrin zhing gzo la byas pa
96b6(mdo 'grel): gzo ba dang/ /dkon mchog sum la dad pa drag po yin/ /de lta'i yon tan ma lus ldan pa dag /rtsod pa'i dus su shin du dkon pas na/ /yon tan phyed dam bzhi cha brgyad cha can/ /de lta bu ni sngags pas grogs por bsten/ zhes so/ /'dir ni spros pa gcod
96b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /spros dang bral ba'i dbang gis grogs po med pa 'am/ rjes su mthun pa'i grogs po dang ldan par bya'o/ /de bzhin du ji tsam gyis gnod pa de tsam gyi gos la brten gyi tshegs dang bcas shing lhag par chags par gyur pa'i gos dang gnas mal bsten
97a1(mdo 'grel): par mi bya ste/ 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las ji skad du gsungs pa/ gtsug pur gzhag ste skra ni bregs nas su/ /'byung khungs mtshon gyi gos kyi kha dog bsgyur/ /gos dkar dang ni shing lo 'am gso ba 'am/ /zar ma'i shin
97a2(mdo 'grel): shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o zhes so/ /yang 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las/ sngags zlos khyim pa mkhas pa yis/ /kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos mi bgo zhes gsungs te/ 'di dag ni rnyed bla bar bya ba dang/ sgeg pa nyid dgag par bya ba'i don yin no/
97a3(mdo 'grel): rjes su mthun pa'i spyod lam ni gsum ste/ legs par gnas pa dang/ sdug bsngal gnon pa dang/ khyad par du 'gro ba'o/ /de la legs par gnas pa ni ji lta bu'i spyod lam gyis gnas kyang des sems la rma mi 'byung bas te/ ji skad du 'phags pa sdong po
97a4(mdo 'grel): bkod pa las byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad ni bdud kyi las so/ /zhes gsungs la/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las kyang/ sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa/ /brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya
97a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bshad la/ yang de nyid las/ bdag ni rnyed dang bkur sti dang/ /lus dang 'tsho ba med bla zhing/ /dge ba gzhan yang nyams bla yi/ /sems ni nams kyang nyams mi bya/ /zhes bstan te/ de bas na dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du yang sems
97a6(mdo 'grel): la mi gnod pa'i spyod lam spyad do/ /de bas na slob dpon DoM pi pa'i zhal nas/ slob sbyong slob spang spyad pa dang/ /bram ze na yang gtsang sbra yid/ /rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod pa bya/ /sems la gnod pa ma yin no zhes bshad do/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa ni lam
97a7(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pas grang ba dang tsha ba dang/ /bkres pa dang/ skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mo lus pas mi g.yo bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ ji skad du gsungs pa/ nya pa gdol pa zhing la sogs pa dang/ rang gi 'tsho
97b1(mdo 'grel): ba tsam zhig sems pa yang/ /grang dang tsha la sogs pa'i gnod bzod na/ /'gro ba'i don phyir bdag lta cis mi bzod ces so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang/ 'dod la ma chags lus kyi nyon mongs bzod ces gsungs pa/ de
97b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'phags pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bka' las kyang/ /lus kyi nyon mongs dpyad pa las/ /dngos grub rnam gsum thob par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang 'dod chen sdug bsngal chen
97b3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /rang gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya zhes gsungs pas/ sdug bsngal 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnams ni/ rab tu dga' ba bzhin du bsten par bya'i/ /sems kyi ngang tshul bdar ba nyid du mi bya'o/ /de bas 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las/
97b4(mdo 'grel): lha yi bde ba dang ni 'byor pa dang/ /tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /thos mang mdangs bzangs gcig tu yid gzhungs dang/ /dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob ces gsungs so/ /khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod lam ni des
97b5(mdo 'grel): mnyam par ma gzhag pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag pa dang/ sAts+tsha gdab pa dang/ bskor ba bya ba la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs la gus pa nyid du bya ste/ de ltar yang 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa/
97b6(mdo 'grel): langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yum/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klags zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang gsungs pa/ gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs rnams su ni/ /'jim pa 'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i
97b7(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can/ /sdig ba sbyang phyir rtag tu gdab par bya/ zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo las kyang/ mkhas pas mchod rten las bya zhing/ /de bzhin dam pa'i
98a1(mdo 'grel): chos kyang klag /dge ba cung zad gzhan dag kyang/ /cung zad zin nas 'di dag kyang/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob 'dod pas/ /rtag tu sems can rnams la bsngo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na ji tsam du sems la mi gnod pa'i bsod
98a2(mdo 'grel): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs g.yeng ba dang bcas pa rnams sems can la phan par 'dod pas rab tu gus par byas la brtsams te/ 'di ni rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa rnam pa gsum mo/ /de ltar tshogs thob pa des spyod lam rnam pa bzhi gang bde par
98a3(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa 'am/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la sems mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar sems mnyam par 'jog pa nges/ nyes pa lnga spang ba'i phyir spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad bsten par bya ste/ de la nyes pa lnga ni dbu
98a4(mdo 'grel): dang mdza' rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las/ le lo dang ni gdam ngag rnams/ /brjed dang bying dang rgod pa dang/ /'du mi byed dang 'du byed de/ /'di dag nyes pa lngar 'dod do zhes gsungs so/ /de dag gi gnyen po spong pa'i 'du byed
98a5(mdo 'grel): brgyad kyang de nyid las gsungs te/ gnas de dag la gnas pa dang/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du'o/ /dmigs pa brjed par ma gyur dang/ /bying dang rgod pa rtog pa dang/ /de spong mngon par 'du byed dang/ /zhi tshe rnal du 'jug pa'o zhes so/ /de
98a6(mdo 'grel): ltar yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa des/ /zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bsgom par bya ba las/ 'dir zhi gnas de ni gnyis te/ kha nang du bltas pas thob pa dang/ kha phyir bltas pa la dmigs pa'o/ /de la kha nang du bltas pa la yang gnyis te/ lus
98a7(mdo 'grel): la dmigs pa dang/ lus la brten pa la dmigs pa'o/ /de la lus la dmigs pa la yang gsum ste/ lus nyid la lha'i rnam par dmigs pa dang/ keng rus la sogs pa mi sdug par dmigs pa dang/ kha TwAM ga sogs pa mtshan ma khyad
98b1(mdo 'grel): par can la dmigs pa'o/ /lus la brten pa la yang dmigs pa yang lnga ste/ dbugs la dmigs pa dang/ mtshan ma phra mo la dmigs pa dang/ thig le la dmigs pa dang/ 'od zer gyi yan lag la dmigs pa dang/ dga' ba dang bde ba la
98b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'o/ /kha phyir bltas pa la dmigs pa la yang gnyis te/ khyad par can dang/ phal pa'o/ /de la khyad par can la yang gnyis te/ sku la dmigs pa dang/ gsung la dmigs pa'o/ /'di dag ni zhi gnas la 'jug pa'i yan lag go/
98b3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar bsgom pa la 'dir mi brjod de/ gzhung shin tu mang po 'gyur bas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang/ bla ma dam pas nyams su myong ba'i man ngag la brten par rigs kyi/ bsgom par bya ba'i man ngag ni yi ger gnas pas shes par dga' ba'i phyir dang/
98b4(mdo 'grel): zhib tu ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bstan pa las bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /zhi gnas kyi 'bras bu ni lhag mthong yin la lhag mthong gi 'bras bu ni/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa yin te/ de yang dngos po gang yang mi gnas pas dngos po
98b5(mdo 'grel): med pa bye brag tu mthong la/ de nyid kyi tshe sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas dmigs pa du ma rab tu rgyug pa rab tu zhi bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i gnas skabs 'dir/ ye shes kyi dmigs pa gang
98b6(mdo 'grel): yin pa dang/ ye shes nyid tshul ji ltar gnas pa dang/ rnal 'byor spyod pa pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang/ bdag cag dbu ma pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa la khyad par ci yin pa dag la/ bdag gi blo rab tu 'phro bar bzod
98b7(mdo 'grel): mod kyi/ 'dir nyams su blang ba'i thabs tsam gsal bar byed 'dod kyi/ grub pa'i mdza' gtan la 'bebs par 'dod pa ni ma yin pa dang/ 'phags pa nA gA rdzun la sogs pas gsal bar mdzad pa las/ cung zad kyang sus kyang smrar med pa'i
99a1(mdo 'grel): phyir rgya cher ma spros so/ /da ni gzhan 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i zhi gnas mdun du ma bcas par lhag mthong skye ba rung ba yin nam zhe na/ de ni rung ba nyid de/ mtshan ma med pa'i zhi gnas so sor
99a2(mdo 'grel): rtog pa'i shes rab nyid las mtshan ma med pa'i lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes 'byung ste/ de ltar yang 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las/ shing gnyis drud pa las ni me 'byung ste/ /byung ba de yis de nyid bsreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin
99a3(mdo 'grel): shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang/ /skyes pa de yis de nyid bsreg par byed zhes gsungs so/ /so sor rtog pa'i shes rab ni zhi gnas ma yin te/ rnam pa du mas dmigs so zhe na/ de lta na ni zhi gnas kyang zhi gnas ma yin te/ skad cig du ma dang cha
99a4(mdo 'grel): shas du ma la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan yang zhi gnas las lhag mthong la 'jug pa yang ji ltar so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis mtshams sbyor bar mi byed/ de ni byed pa ni 'ga' zhig tu zad do/ /de la 'di'i rim pa yang lus kho na la brtags
99a5(mdo 'grel): pas 'grub pa ste/ 'phags pa nA gA rdzu na'i zhal nas/ 'jig rten rnam par rtog las byung/ /rnam par rtog pa sems las byung/ /sems kyang lus las byung bas na/ /de phyir lus la spyad par bya zhes bshad la/ 'phags pa nA gA rdzu na'i zhal snga
99a6(mdo 'grel): nas yang bshad pa/ lus med rnam par shes pa ni/ /med ces bya ba rtogs par gyis zhes bshad cing mdo las kyang/ rnam par shes pa ni lus las mi 'da' o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na chos thams cad sems la bsdu ba dang/ sems
99a7(mdo 'grel): lus la bsdu ba dang/ lus chos kyi dbyings su nye bar rnal 'byor du bya ba 'di ni man ngag go /yang na lus dang sems tha dad pa la dmigs par bya ste/ 'di'i man ngag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las shes par bya'o/ /de bas na mtshan ma dang
99b1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i zhi gnas la brten pa bas ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i zhi gnas la dmigs nas lhag mthong bskyed pa'i phyogs 'di bsngags te/ de'i gnas pa brten pa dang/ zhi gnas 'ba' zhig gis nyon mongs pa rab tu gnon cing sel ba dang/
99b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir ni bdag gi bla ma'i man ngag las 'byung 'di bris pas/ /nye bar 'phel ba'i dge ba'i zla zer dri ma med pa des/ /'gro ba'i mi shes rab rib mun bsal gdung ba zhi byas te/ /shes rab mig
99b3(mdo 'grel): gis de bzhin nyid yul rab gsal thob par shog /bdag kyang rnam par g.yeng sogs rlung sogs rab zhi mun bsal nas/ /myur du thub rdbang rnams dang spyod yul gcig la lta bar shog /ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
99b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pi rya tsan+d+ra las zhus te/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
99b5(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa mA d+hi saM b+hA ra pa ri barta nA ma/ bod skad du/ ting nge 'dzin tshogs kyi le'u zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por mi lus rin po che chud mi gsan cing mi'i lus thob pa don yod
99b6(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pa'i gang zag gis thog mar sngon du 'gro ba yan lag bdun dang ldan par bya ste/ gzhi dad pa dang ldan pa dang/ rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing de'i yon tan len pa dang/ gus pa dang ldan pa dang/ yid ches zhing the tshom mi za ba dang
99b7(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ thams cad la yid skyo ba med pa dang/ thams cad du nga rgyal spangs te/ de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /dus dang rnam pa thams cad du gzhan gyi skyon la mi brtag cing nyes pa mi brjod pa dang/ rang gi yon
100a1(mdo 'grel): tan la rlom sems mi skyed? pa dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod par 'dod pa'i 'gro bas rang srung ba dang/ sdom pa rnam pa gsum la nan tan du spyad pa dang/ ngo dga' dang gsar 'grogs dang mtho ltag spangs te rtag tu zungs thub par
100a2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa dang/ yul dang dus dang gnas skabs kyis gzhan gyi rgyud tshod shes pa'i sgo nas spyad par bya ba dang/ gzhan la brnyas pa spang zhing khyad kyis mi bsad par bya ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho bas mi gos shing ya rabs kyi tshul mi nyams pa'i
100a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /rtag tu 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa dang/ zhen pa dang chags pa che zhing 'dzin pa che ba spang ba dang/ le lo dang snyoms las spang ba dang/ ha kyang thal bar 'gyur ba yang shes par bya ba dang/ don chen por mi 'gyur ba'i
100a4(mdo 'grel): gtam dang/ bya ba la sogs spang zhing mi 'jug pa dang/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa spang ba dang/ gang gi gnyen por 'gro ba bsten shes par bya ba ste/ de dag ni bar chad spang ba'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /mi'i lus thob pa dang sangs rgyas
100a5(mdo 'grel): kyi chos spyod cing sgrub pa ni dkon no snyam pa dang/ de lta bu'i sgrub pa ni don chen po dang ldan pa yin no snyam pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba byed pa rnams ni nges par don med par shes par bya ba dang/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal rang gi gnyan por bsten par shes
100a6(mdo 'grel): par bya ba dang/ da ni rtag tu bdud kyi spang ba na 'dug ste myur du 'chi'o zhes bsam pa dang/ bsags pa thams cad ni nges par lus par shes par bya ba dang/ rang gi gnyer ma dang skra dkar la sogs pa la rtag tu brtag cing skyo bar bya ba ste/ de dag ni rang
100a7(mdo 'grel): la rang gis bzhin bskul btab pa'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni zab cing rgya che bka' dang mdo sde ni grangs mang bdag ni blo ngan zhing rmongs la le lo che bas thams cad brjod cing shes par mi nus te/ bdag nyid tshe zad par
100b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur du 'od snyam dang/ sgra dang yi ge'i rjes su 'brang ba'i bshad pa'i shes pa 'di dag gis gzhan thul ba'am phan thogs pa ma yin te/ mi rnams ni shin tu mgu dka' bar bsam pa dang/ rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mdza' la chags sdang rnam pa
100b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis spangs te skur ba mi gdab pa dang/ spun zla dang nye du dang mdza' bshes la sogs pa rnams ni nges par 'gron po lam gyis bsdus pa dang 'dra bar bsam pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang/ bstod pa dang smad pa la sogs pa
100b3(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni nges par bslu ba nyid yin par shes par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi rnyed pa dang 'dod pa dang sred pa dang khe dang grags pa dang nga rgyal dang rlo ma sems la sogs 'di dag ni nges par me dang dug dang mtshon chen po dang 'dra bar shes par bya
100b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ phyi dang nang gis dngos po 'di dag la sgyu ma 'am rmi lam lta bur rgyun tu spyad par bya ba ste/ de dag ni gdung ba gcad pa'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /'du 'ji la dga' ba spang zhing dben par gnas par bya ba dang/ der yang rang gzhung
100b5(mdo 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du lha gnyis par bya ba dang/ lha mngon du bya ba rnam pa gsum la brtson zhing 'bad rtsol drag tu bya ba dang/ der yang re ba dang dogs pa dang 'dod pa dang 'jig pa spangs te gnas par bya ba dang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang/ sems
100b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sgo nas blang dor med par ngas sgrub pa 'di'i sgo nas 'dod pa'i don ma grub pa'i bar du lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo zhes dam bcas pa bsgrub pa dang/ der yang rmi lam la sogs pa rtags dang mtshan ma
100b7(mdo 'grel): ci byung yang dga' ba dang mi dga' ba mi bya zhing gzhan la mi smra ba dang/ der yang lha'i rmi lam dang/ rtags la sogs pa ni gdams ngag las shes par bya zhing khyad kyis mi gsad pa ste/ de dag ni skyes bu'i don myur du 'grub cing mngon du
101a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /de lta bu'i gang zag gi lus ni shin tu dkon zhing gces pas na lus bsrung bar bya ste/ gos dang zas dang sman la sogs pa ji ltar mthun par spyad pa dang/ me dang mi ma
101a2(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i gnod pa bsrung ba dang/ gnas mthun zhing bde zhing gnod pa med pa la gnas pa dang/ lus sems ngal zhing dub pa'i las dang/ bya ba mi bya ba dang/ nam phyed dang nyi ma phyed dang zas 'ju ba'i dus dang lus la nad khams skye ba'i dus
101a3(mdo 'grel): su dmigs ba la 'bad rtsol mi bya ba dang/ lus dang sems dal zhing dub pa'i dus su skyo ba bsang zhing dmigs pa gsor ba ni man ngag las shes par bya ba dang/ rtag tu spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor gyi lus mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ de dag ni lus bsrung
101a4(mdo 'grel): zhing gnod pa gsal ba'i yan lag rnam pa bdun no/ /de ltar gnas pas skyo zhing dge ba la g.yel ba dang bya ba dang byed pa'i rnam rtog byung nas rang gis rang la lcag brdab cing gnyen po bskyed par bya'o/ /lus la gnod pa glo bur ba byung ba dang shes
101a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i bye brag mi 'dra bar byung na/ rang gi nyams dang man ngag gis bcos par bya zhing/ yang na mkhas ba gzhan la yang dri bar bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bka' dang rang la nus pa yod pa dang/ gzhan gyi don mthong na phrin las rnam pa bzhi ni rdo rje gtsug tor
101a6(mdo 'grel): gyi rgyud dang/ man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa mi 'dra ba dang/ sems can gyi rnam par rtog pa mi 'dra ba rnams la gnyen po mi 'dra ba rnams ni mdo sde rgya bo che rnams las shes par bya ste/ de dag kha 'phangs pa 'am kha skong gi yan
101a7(mdo 'grel): lag rnam pa bzhi'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi cho gas kyi le'u/ slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+N+yo pa de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lotsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing
101b1(mdo 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ d+harmmA Shad+d+hya netA bya s+thA na/ bod skad du/ bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par bzhag pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ser skya mo dang chu skyar sbrul/ /nags na
101b2(mdo 'grel): ri dags tshol ba dang/ /mda' mkhan dang ni gzhon nu ma/ /'di drug nga yi slob dpon yin/ /re ba stobs ldan nyon mongs te/ /re ba med pa bde ba'i mchog /re ba re ba med byed pa/ /bde bar gnyid log ser skya mo/ /zang zing phyir ni rtsod 'gyur te/
101b3(mdo 'grel): zang zing med la brtsod pa med/ /zang zing yongs su spangs pa las/ /chu skyar bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ /khyim gyi rtsom pa sdug bsngal te/ /nam yang bde bar 'gyur ba min/ /sbrul gyis gzhan gyi gnas mthong na/ /zhugs pas bde ba 'phel
101b4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /rngon pa nags su song gyur te/ /ri dags tshol bar rtsom pa na/ /'tshe ba thams cad spangs nas ni/ /de nyid du ni gnas bcas gyur/ /'dir ni rgyal po'i yan lag bzhi'i/ /dpung tshogs chen pos bskor ba dag /dmigs pa yun
101b5(mdo 'grel): rings gtod pas na/ /mda' mkhan gyis ni ma mthong bzhin/ /mang po rtag tu 'thab gyur te/ /gnyis po dag ni 'gran zlar 'gyur/ /gzhan du ma yi gdu bu bzhin/ /gcig pu rnam par rgyu bar bya/ /re ba zang zing khyim spangs dang/ /de bzhin
101b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang nags gnas dang/ /dmigs pa brten dang gcig pu nyid/ /bdag gi bla ma las 'di rnyed/ /bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par bzhag pa slob dpon chen po a ba shu ti pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
101b7(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+harmAd+d+ha notpya? bas+thA na brit+ti/ bod skad du/ bsam gtan gyi chos drug rnam par bzhag pa'i 'grel pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan dag la gus btud de/ /chos drug pa yi 'grel pa bya/ /de la
102a1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan chos drug ni/ /sdom dang rgyas par bshad pa'o/ /de la sdom ni/ ser skya mo dang chu skyar sbrul zhes pa nas/ 'di drug pa yi slob dpon yin zhes pa'i bar du'o/ /nga ni rgyas par bshad pa ni de'ang dpe drug gis ston pa
102a2(mdo 'grel): las/ dang po re ba spang bar ston pa ni/ re ba stobs ldan nyon mongs te/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/ /ser skya mo zhes bya ba ni bud med smad 'tshong ma zhig skyes pa dang dus btab pa las/ mtshan gyi stong ni skyes pa 'ong du re ba las yang sdug bsngal
102a3(mdo 'grel): bar gyur la/ mtshan gyi smad ni skyes pa mi 'ong bar re thag chod pas sems bde bar gnyid kyis log pa de bzhin du/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod sngar ma thob ba'i yul rnams thob par re ba'i skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
102a4(mdo 'grel): na/ stobs chung ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na 'dod pa'i yon tan ma thob pa la re ba mi byed pa ni bde ba'i mchog yin te/ de la sdug bsngal gyis gdung bar mi byed do/ /da ni zang zing spang bar bya ba ston pa ni/ /zang zing phyir ni rtsod
102a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /zhes bya ba la sogs smos te/ dper na chu skyar zhig gis nya gcig bzung ba dang/ ji srid nya de ma bor gyi bar du chu skyar gzhan gyis bsnyags te rtsod par gyur nas/ nya de bor ma thag rtsod pa med de bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
102a6(mdo 'grel): zang zing gi longs spyod ci tsam yod pa de tsam du 'thab cing rtsod pa'i sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ zang zing gi longs spyod kun spangs te med pa la ni sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba med cing bde ba thob pa yin no/ /da ni khyim spang bar bya ba ston te/
102a7(mdo 'grel): khyim gyi rtsom pa sdug bsngal te/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dper na sbrul zhig rang gi ched na gnas pa las/ sbrul gyi phrug gu mang pos gces pas ma bzod de/ tshang de nas byung ste phug gzhan zhig tu zhugs pas bde ba thob pa gyur
102b1(mdo 'grel): ba de bzhin du khyim gyi gnas na so nam la sogs pa'i khang las ni shin tu yang dka' zhing sdug bsngal te/ skad cig tsam gyi bde ba yang med la/ nam zhig khyim spangs par gyur pa na sdug bsngal ba med de bde bar gyur pa yin no/ /spang bar bya ba
102b2(mdo 'grel): gsum bshad zin to/ /da ni dang du blang ba gsum las/ dgon par gnas pa dang du blang ba ston te/ rngon pa nags su song gyur te/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dper na rngon po zhig dus rtag tu nags su rgyu zhing ri dags tshol du song ba na/ khyim gyi
102b3(mdo 'grel): las sdug bsngal bar rig cing dgon pa'i gnas bde ba'i yon tan mthong nas gsod pa'i las spangs te/ dgon pa'i gnas de nyid du gnas nas bde bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ gang zhig khyim spangs te/ lam bcol ba'i phyir dgon par gnas
102b4(mdo 'grel): nas lus dang sems mchog tu las su rung bar gyur pa yin no/ /da ni dmigs pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang du blang ba ston te/ 'dir rgyal po'i yan lag bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smas te/ dper na mda' mkhan zhig mda' bya ba'i
102b5(mdo 'grel): phyir smyug ma song ba la sems bstang pa na/ rgyal po chen po zhig gis 'khor rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs bzhis bskor te/ mang po 'gro ba'i bun long des ma mthong ma thos pa de bzhin du/ dgon pa'i gnas dben par
102b6(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas kyi sems rtse gcig pa la rgyun du blo gtang ba rnams la yul rnams kyis sems mi 'phogs par gyur pa yin no/ /da ni gcig pu 'dug pa dang du blang ba ston te/ mang po rtag tu 'thab gyur te/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dper na
102b7(mdo 'grel): bud med gzhon nu ma gcig tsan dan bdar ba na/ lag pa'i gdu bu mang po phrul ba ma bde nas rim gyis phyung ste/ gdu bu gnyis zhig gzhag pa las de yang 'thab nas ma bde ste/ gcig gzhag ba la bde bar gyur pa bzhin du dgon pa'i gnas
103a1(mdo 'grel): der yang grogs po mang po dang rtsod par 'gyur zhing/ gnyis kyang nyon mongs pa'i yul du 'gyur bar/ gcig pu 'dug pa bsngags pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /de ltar dang du blang ba gsum yang bshad zin
103a2(mdo 'grel): to/ /de ltar sdom dang rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni bsdu ba'i sgo nas bstan te/ skad cig gis ni spang bar bya ba ston te/ de yang gang zhe na/ re ba zang zing khyim spangs dang/ zhes bya ba smos te/ yid la re ba spang ba dang/ zang zing gi dngos po spang ba
103a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ khyim la chags pa spang ba'o/ /tshig rkang gnyis kyis ni dang du blang ba bsdus te ston te/ gang zhe na/ de bzhin gzhan yang nags gnas dang/ /dmigs pa bstan dang gcig pa nyid/ zhes smos te/ gnas dang du blang ba dang/ dmigs
103a4(mdo 'grel): pa la sogs rtse gcig tu bya ba dang du blang ba dang/ bdag nyid gcig pur 'dug pa dang du blang ba'o/ /nga ni slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa nyid kyis rang bzor byas pa ma yin pa ni tshig rkang gcig gis ston te/ gang zhe na/ bdag gi bla ma las 'di
103a5(mdo 'grel): rnyed ces smos so/ /bdag gis zhes bya bas ni a ba d+hU ti pas so/ /bla ma las zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhi ba las so/ /'di rnyed ces bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi chos drug po 'di'o/ /dngos su na bdag nyid kyis slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi ba las bsam
103a6(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi chos drug po 'di rnyed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /chos drug 'grel pa gsal byas pas/ /sems can dug gsum gyis gdungs pa/ /ting 'dzin bdud rtsi 'thungs gyur nas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa myur thob shog /bsam gtan gyi chos
103a7(mdo 'grel): drug rnam par bzhag pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dA na shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA sh+rI b+ha dra dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
103b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ e ka smri ti u ba de sha/ bod skad du/ dran pa gcig pa'i man ngag/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen la gus btud de/ /'phags pa klu sgrub phyag 'tshal nas/ /a ba d+hU ti bdag gis
103b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gcig char 'jug pa'i man ngag bri/ /'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dbang bskur chen po ma thob kyi bar de srid du de'i bya ba ni gnyis te/ shes rab kyi bya ba dang/ thabs kyi bya ba'o/ /de la shes rab ni chos
103b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad gdong ma nas ma skyes pa dang po nyid nas chos kyi dbyings nyid du shes pa'o/ /de'i bya ba ni las dang po pa de nyid nas ji srid dbang bskur ba ma thob kyi bar de srid du nyin mtshan dus rtag tu de nyid bsgom pa'o/ /thabs ni sems can mi gtong ba'i byang
103b4(mdo 'grel): chub kyi sems so/ /de'i bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad sems can thams cad kyi ched ma yin pa ci yang med de/ dngos sam brgyud pas so/ /'di yang sems can la dmigs pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa'i rim pa'o/ /de'i rim
103b5(mdo 'grel): ba ni 'di yin te/ mi mkhas pa rab rib can dang mkhas pa rab rib dangs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe chos kyi sku mngon sum du mdzad phan chad shes rab mnga' ste/ ye shes nyid du gyur nas gnas so/ /shes rab kyi bya ba ni mi mnga' ste goms nas mthar phyin
103b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /thabs de'i bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa/ rang gi ngang gis lhun gyis grub pa dang/ 'bad pa dang rtsol ba med par 'byung ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' las dang po bas ni gang zag gi bdag yod pas sems can zhes brtags shing des sdug
103b7(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba las snying rje bskyed do/ /de nas goms nas ni sems can zhes bya ba ni/ dang po nyid nas med kyi glo bur du ming du btags par zad do/ /gzhan du na rten 'brel gyi phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched tsam zhig las/ gzhan 'di na ci yang med
104a1(mdo 'grel): do snyam du rtog pa dang/ yang 'di dag ni rang gi sems 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi/ gzhan 'di na ci yang med de snyam du rtogs na de sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje skye'o/ /gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dmigs pa'i yul med
104a2(mdo 'grel): de/ 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa las ji skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyis ci yang mi gzigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ye shes kyi yul mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'o na dus de nas
104a3(mdo 'grel): ye shes yod dam med ce na/ 'phags pa klu sgrub mi bzhed de ji skad du/ sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin la/ /ci lta bu zhig gzigs par 'gyur/ /zhes
104a4(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa dang/ brgyud pa'i man ngag 'di yin no/ /de nas gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa/ bya ba gzhan ci yang mi mnga' la/ 'di ltar gzhan gyi don ni 'dod par bya ba'i don gyi 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin te/ ji skad du/ 'phags pa klu
104a5(mdo 'grel): sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /'bras bu'i gtso bo yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan/ /de dag don gyi 'bras bur 'dod ces gsungs so/ /de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i man ngag kyang blo la
104a6(mdo 'grel): gnas par bya'o/ /tshul khrims rgyal bas bskul ba yis/ /'dir ni bsdus nas bstan pa yin/ /rgyas par klu sgrub gdam ngag dang/ /theg chen mdo sde lta bar gyis/ /cig char 'jug pa'i man ngag paN Di ta dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyAM nas mdzad pa
104a7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// //paN Di ta de nyid dang lotsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// (//dbu ma'i man ngag ces bya ba bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya ma u pa de sha na ma/ bod
104b1(mdo 'grel): skad du/ dbu ma'i man ngag ces bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /bdag sogs rmongs pa ma lus pa'i/ /snying gi pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i/ /dam pa'i skyes mchog de la 'dud/ /theg pa chen po dbu ma'i
104b2(mdo 'grel): man ngag ni 'di yin te/ kun rdzob du chos thams cad tshu rol mthong ba'i dor byas nas/ rgyu 'bras la sogs pa rnam par bzhag pa thams cad ji ltar snang ba bzhin du bden pa yin la/ don dam par ri mo yang dag par na/ kun rdzob ji ltar snang ba de
104b3(mdo 'grel): kho na gtan tshigs chen po rnams kyis gzhigs shing bsal na/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i tshad tsam kyang gzung du med do/ /zhes nges par khong du chud par bya'o/ /stan bde ba la bskyil mor krung bcas te 'dug la/ 'di ltar re zhig dngos po
104b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis te/ gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'o/ /de la gzugs can rnams ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin la/ de yang phyogs cha'i dbye bas phye zhing gzhigs na shin tu phra ba yang lus pa med cing dbyibs dang bral ba/ nam mkha' 
104b5(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra bas ma grub pa 'am yang na gcig dang du ma dang bral bas sam de yang 'di ltar 'das pa'i sems ni 'gags shing zhig /ma 'ongs pa'i sems ni ma skyes shing ma byung/ da ltar gyi sems ni 'di ltar yang shin tu brtag dka' 
104b6(mdo 'grel): ste/ kha dog med cing shin tu snang ba'ang med do/ /gzugs can ma yin par ni sems yin la/ de'ang 'di ltar 'das pa'i sems ni 'gags shing zhig /ma 'ongs pa'i sems ni ma skyes shing ma byung/ da ltar gyi sems ni 'di ltar yang shin
104b7(mdo 'grel): tu brtag dka' ste kha dog med cing dbyibs dang bral ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra bas sam grub pa 'am/ yang na gcig du ma dang bral bas sam/ yang na ma skyes pas sam/ yang na de rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la sogs pas/ rigs pa'i
105a1(mdo 'grel): mtshon gyis spyad cing bzhigs na ma grub par rtogs so/ /de ltar gnyis po ci'i ngo bor ma grub cing med tsam na/ so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab de nyid kyang ma grub ste/ dper na shing gnyis phan tshun drung bas me byung
105a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rkyen gyis shing gnyis po nyid tshig cing med pa'i rjes la/ gang gis sreg par byed pa'i me de nyid kyang rang zhi ba de bzhin du/ rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad med par grub tsam na/ shes rab de nyid kyang snang ba med pa 'od
105a3(mdo 'grel): gsal ba ci'i ngo bo yang ma grub pas bying ba dang/ rgod pa la sogs pa'i skyon du gyur pa thams cad bsal te/ bar skabs der shes pas cir yang mi 'dzin/ dran pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ ji srid du sa tshan ma 'am/ rnam
105a4(mdo 'grel): par rtog pa'i dgra 'am chom rkun ma langs kyi bar du/ de lta bu la shes pa gnas par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ldang bar 'dod na ngal bus skyil mo krung bshig la langs te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i yid kyis/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba ci nus kyis
105a5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de ltar gus pa dang/ yun ring ba dang/ rgyun ma chad par bsgrubs na skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ tshe 'di nyid la bden pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur 'bad pa dang/ rtsol ba med cing rang gi ngang gis lhun gyis
105a6(mdo 'grel): grub par mngon sum du byed do/ /de'i rjes las thob pas ni chos thams cad sgyu ma la sogs par shes so/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje lta bu ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas phan chad ni/ rjes las thob pa spang mi mnga' ste/ dus thams cad du mnyam par
105a7(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa'o/ /de ltar ma yin na byang chub sems dpa' dang khyad par ci yod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rigs pa dang lung 'dir me brjod do/ /gzhan gyi don bskal pa grangs med par tshogs bsags pa dang/ smon lam btab pa'i mthus
105b1(mdo 'grel): gdul bya rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /lung dang rigs pa shin tu mang mod kyi 'dor ma spos so/ /dbu ma'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
105b2(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas lha sa 'phrul snang du bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// //ra sa 'brul snang gtsug lag khang chen du/ /mar me mdzad dpal
105b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'i mkhas pa la/ /bod kyi rngog btsun legs pa'i shes rab kyis/ /gsol ba btab nas bdag gis bsgyur ba yin/ /gnas brtan mar me mdzad dpal gyis/ /gzhung lugs skyes bu gsum 'dzin pa/ /gol ba'i lam du mi 'gro zhes//
105b4(mdo 'grel): nags che tshul khrims rgyal pas smra// (//dbu ma'i man ngag rin po che'i za ma tog ces bya ba jo bos mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ ratna ka raN+Dodg+ha Te ma d+hya ma nA mo ba de sha/ bod skad du/ dbu ma'i man ngag rin po che'i za ma
105b5(mdo 'grel): tog kha phye ba zhes bya ba rje btsun 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyi brgyud pa'i man ngag bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni skyes bu gang zhig bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i 'khor ba thog ma
105b6(mdo 'grel): med pa can gyi sdug bsngal rjes su dren pas til 'bru tsam gyi dngos po yang mi 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten gyi dngos po dang/ bya ba ma lus pa mchil ma'i thal ba ltar bor ba dang po khas blangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa gsum ma nyams
105b7(mdo 'grel): shing gtsang ba/ thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis snying rje yod pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyir lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba des/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi brgyud pa'i gdams ngag yod pa'i skyes bu dam
106a1(mdo 'grel): pa btsal la/ de dus yun ring por mnyes par byas nas las dang po ba yin pas sa tra chen po 'am/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ bas mdza' la sogs pa 'tsho bsgrub sla bar gnas la/ dkon
106a2(mdo 'grel): mchog gi gzugs rnyan gyi spyan sngar stan 'jam zhing 'bol ba la 'dug la/ 'di ltar sems kyi rigs ni sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ drong gsher las skyes pa dang/ brdzus te skyes pa dang/ gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa dang/
106a3(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang 'du shes can ma yin pa'i 'gro ba lnga'i sems can la legs par bltas la/ thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin te/ ma 'ong dag gis bdag gi ched du sdig pa byas shing bsags pas de'i rnam smin gyis da lta sdug bsngal mang
106a4(mdo 'grel): po nyams su myong ngo/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yis/ /'gro ba gsum po rnams rmongs la/ /blo dang ldan pas legs bltas nas/ /'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don par bya zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang
106a5(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ srid pa'i btson ra'i nang gnas pa/ /nyon mongs me yis gdungs pa yi/ /sems can gang yin thams cad sngon/ /pha ma mdza' bshes rtsa lag tu/ /gyur cing phan cher btags pas na/ /'di dag bdag
106a6(mdo 'grel): gis sdug bsngal byas/ /nga ni bde bar bya bar rigs/ /zhes gsungs pas drin shes bdag gis 'di dag bsgral ba dang/ bgrol ba dang/ dbugs dbyung ba dang/ mya ngan las bzla'o zhes tshad med pa bzhis byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ de'i
106a7(mdo 'grel): ched du tshogs gnyis bsags par bya'o/ /rmi lam gyi sems dang ma bral bas/ nam mkha' i dbyings 'di dkon mchog gsum gyis til gyi ga'u bzhin du khyab pa la/ dam pa bdun dang/ 'du shes bdun dran par byas pa dang/ rjes su dran pa'i
106b1(mdo 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa yang brjod de/ gnyen po drug gi sgo nas lus kyi bkod pa yang byas nas phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/
106b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ lus dbul ba dang/ sdom pa blang ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i lam la gnas par dam bcas la/ de dag byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings su gyur te/ mchod pa'i gnas
106b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang po gang nas byon/ de lta gang du bzhud snyam du brtags nas gang nas kyang ma byon gang du yang ma bzhud phyi nang gi chos 'di dag kyang de kho na bzhin yin pas/ thams cad rang sems sgyu ma'i rnam par 'phrul
106b4(mdo 'grel): pa brdzun bzhin du snang/ snang bzhin du brdzun pas de dag lus la bsdu de yang sems la bsdu/ sems ni kha dog med pa/ dbyibs med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gdod nas ma skyes pa'i/ /so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab de nyid kyang 'od
106b5(mdo 'grel): gsal bar gyur to/ /bar der shes pa ci yang ma yin la/ cir yang mi gnas pa/ cir ma grub pa/ ci'i rnam par yang ma skyes pa/ spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba/ ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' i gung lta bu'i mtshan ma'i rdul thams cad dangs
106b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nam mkha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin snang ba med pa la ci tsam nus par gnas so/ /ma goms pa'i dbang gis sems yengs par gyur na yang de nyid du bkug la gnas so/ /thun gzhan yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /thun mangs mang la yun thung bar
106b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ gang gi cha goms par gyur cing zang bstan pa na ji ring ji ring bya'o/ /sgrib pa lnga po so so'i gnyen po'i zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas mig che la e ma'o ngo mtshar ro/ /chos kyi dbyings ci yang med pa la cir yang snang ba 'di ngo mtshar che'o/ /'di dag
107a1(mdo 'grel): ni rang gi sems nyid brdzun pa'i rnam 'phrul brdzun bzhin du snang/ snang bzhin du rdzun pa ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad kyis mtshon pa snang la rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bltas la smon lam btab nas skyil mo krung dal gyis
107a2(mdo 'grel): bshig la langs te sAts+tsha la sogs pa dge ba'i las ci nus pa bya'o/ /de dag thun drug tu tshogs gnyis bsags pa la 'bad de/ /nyal ba'i dus su stong pa nyid du bsgoms la de'i ngang du gnyid log par bya'o/ /de nas thun tha ma la byams pa dang snying
107a3(mdo 'grel): rje las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis bslang bar bsam mo/ /des ni don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa yin no/ /zas la cha bzhir bgo bar bya'o/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi gsang sngags kyi sgo'i
107a4(mdo 'grel): spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa'i stogs kyis bskyed par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar gus pa dang/ yun ring ba dang/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'bad par byas na/ sems can la snying rje yang shugs kyis skye ste/ slob dpon klu
107a5(mdo 'grel): sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ /stong pa nyid 'di bsgoms byas na/ /blo ni gzhan don la dga' bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /yang gdod nas skye med don de ni/ /blo yis gting nas gtogs gyur nas/ /'khor ba'i 'dam
107a6(mdo 'grel): du bying ba la/ /snying rje ngang gis skye bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa des nang du mnyam par bzhag pa na/ don dam byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la/ de las langs pa na kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas stong pa snying rje
107a7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i snying po can gyi byang chub kyi sems gnyid po brtan par bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/ byang chub nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o/ /zhes dang/ shes rab bsdud pa las/ thob par bya ba'i
107b1(mdo 'grel): chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /byang chub dngos por bzung nas mchog 'dzin ma byed cig /dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya/ zhes pa dang/ yum chen mo 'bum pa las/ ngas ni ci yang thob pa med pa kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs
107b2(mdo 'grel): par sangs rgyas so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa chos yang dag par bsdud pa las kyang/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa'o/ /chog shes pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub kyi sems la lhag par ma
107b3(mdo 'grel): zhen pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan mdo sde rin po che du ma dang/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud du ma nas don 'di nyid gsungs so/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
107b4(mdo 'grel): par spangs/ /chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas/ /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ces dang/ 'phags pa brgyad stong pa las kyang/ shA ri'i bu gang sems ma yin pa de ni sems med pa'o/ /gang sems med pa de na sems
107b5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma gzigs gzigs par ma yin te/ rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin la/ /ji lta bu zhig gzigs par 'gyur zhes
107b6(mdo 'grel): gsungs so/ /rje btsun 'phags pa lha'i zhal nas kyang/ sems kyi sems med rtogs bya'i phyir/ /gang tshe goms par bya ba'i yin/ /de tshe sems ni mthong mi 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa chos yang dag par bsdud pa las kyang/ lha'i bu dag gzhan
107b7(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa de yang bdud kyi lags so/ /sems sgyu mar ma 'tshal nas sems la dngos por bzung ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa de mthol lo bshags so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /skye ba snga ma
108a1(mdo 'grel): grangs med par theg pa chen po la goms pa/ rgyud legs par sbyangs pa/ dbang po rnon pos ni kun rdzob byang chub kyis sems de nyid don dam byang chub kyi sems su 'du shes te/ stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po can yin pas/ rnam
108a2(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid du gnas so/ /don 'di la dgongs nas slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ bdag dang phung po la sogs dang/ /rnam shes rtog bas ma bsgribs pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ /stong pa'i
108a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid dag tu bzhed/ ces gsungs so/ /'o na ji ltar zhe na/ kun rdzob tu sgyu ma'i skyes bu dang/ sprul pa'i skyes bus byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bur bskyed par bya'o/ /ji skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ klu'i
108a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po chos gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ chos gcig po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i byang chub kyi sems so zhes
108a5(mdo 'grel): gsungs pas de bskyed dgos so/ /sems de skye ba'i rgyu dang/ rkyen dang/ ngo bo dang/ rnam pa dang/ sbyang ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ spel ba dang/ de'i phan yon dang/ gtong ba'i rgyu dang/ btang ba'i nyes dmigs dang/ gzhan du bskyed du
108a6(mdo 'grel): bcug pa'i phan yon dang/ gzhan bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i phan yon dang/ gzhan bskyed pa'i bar chad byas pa'i nyes dmigs la mkhas par bya'o/ /de la rgyu ni rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags dang ldan pa ste/ ji skad du/ 'phags pa
108a7(mdo 'grel): bden par smra ba lung bstan pa'i mdo las/ de rgya che ba la mos pas dman pa la mos ba med pa yin/ de rang bzhin gyi snying rje chen po dang ldan pas dkar po'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin/ de sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
108b1(mdo 'grel): gyis yongs su bzung pa yin/ ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pas mi bslu ba yin/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rgyu ba mnyes par byas par dga' ba dang ldan pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kho na ma tho ba med pas sdig pa spangs pa yin/ lhag
108b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i bsam pa skyon med pas yid dam la brtan pa yin/ ro bro ba lam chags pas thams cad dgyes pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang bral ba yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas spyod pa legs par spyod pa yin/ snying
108b3(mdo 'grel): rje chen po'i spyod yul yin pas sems can la snying brtse ba yin/ yo byad lhug par gtang bas thams cad la chags zhen chung ba yin zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ rgyu bzhi ste rigs dang dge ba'i
108b4(mdo 'grel): bshes gnyen dang/ snying rje dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rkyen ni gnyis te sbyor ba'i rkyen dang/ bsam pa'i rkyen no/ /de la sbyor ba'i rkyen gyi chags bsags pa dang/ rgyud spyad pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can
108b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'o/ /tshogs bsags pa yang nyin lan gsum mchen lan gsum du yan lag bdun pa bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo zab mo gdon pa dang/ klag pa dang/ gzungs gdon pa dang/ dkon mchog la mchod pa rgyas par bya ba
108b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ dge 'dun gyi mchod ston yon dang bcas pa bya ba dang/ byis pa'i ston mo dang/ mgon med pa rnams la sbyin pa rgya chen po btang ba dang/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po btang ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /rgyud spyad pa yang snga ma
108b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin du mdo sde zab mo gdon pa dang/ klag pa dang/ gzungs bzlas pa dang/ yan lag bdun pa bya ba dang/ phung po gsum pa gdon pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyan gcod pa dang/ gser 'od dam pa rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung
109a1(mdo 'grel): gis sdig pa bshags par bya'o/ /skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can ni/ khyad par rnam pa bdun gyis khyad par du 'phags te/ rten gyi gang zag gi khyad par dang/ skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum gyi khyad par dang/ dus
109a2(mdo 'grel): kyi khyad par dang/ bsam pa'i khyad par dang/ sbyor ba'i khyad par dang/ bslab bya'i khyad par dang/ phan yon gyi khyad par ro/ /de la skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum gyi khyad par ni/ theg pa chung ba'i skyabs gnas ni/ /ji skad du mdzod
109a3(mdo 'grel): las ni/ /gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/ /sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa yi/ /chos la'ang de bzhin skyabs 'gro zhing/ /mya ngan las 'das la'ang skyabs su 'gro zhes bshad do/ /'dir khyad par ni dkon mchog gsum ni rnam pa
109a4(mdo 'grel): gsum ste/ de kho na nyid kyi dkon mchog gsum dang/ mdun du gzhugs pa'i dkon mchog gsum dang/ mngon par rtogs pa'i dkon mchog gsum ste/ 'di'i don rgyas par bla ma la zhu bar bya'o/ /yang bslab bya'i khyad par 'ba' zhig brjod de/
109a5(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi khyad par dang/ yon tan rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas dkon mchog gsum lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi btang zhing yang dang yang du skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bka' drin chen po rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas dus rtag tu 'am
109a6(mdo 'grel): yang na dus res 'ga' mchod par bya ba dang/ tha na chu gtsang phor ba gang tsam yang dbul bya ba dang/ zas la sogs nga'i phung dbul bar bya'o/ /bya ba ci byed pa dang/ dgos pa ci yod pa ni dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab nas byed kyi
109a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i thabs gzhan spangs pa dang/ 'gro ba gzhan la yang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar bar bya'i theg pa thun mong gi slab bya ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song bas 'jig rten pa'i lha la phyag mi bya ba la sogs pa ste/ dkon mchog
109b1(mdo 'grel): gsum po so so'i bslab bya'o/ /bsam pa'i rkyen ni ji skad du 'phags pa ye shes phyag rgya'i mdo dang snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus su sems bskyed pa dang/ sems can
109b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa dang/ mchod pa dang dbul ba bzang po byas nas sems bskyed pa dang/ gzhan gyi lta bltos nas sems bskyed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong
109b3(mdo 'grel): nas sems bskyed pa ste/ dang po gsum ni byang chub kyi sems dngos yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ 'phags pa chos bcu pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas bskul nas sems bskyed pa dang/
109b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas sems bskyed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mdo
109b5(mdo 'grel): sde'i rgyan las ni rkyen lnga gsungs te/ grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs/ /thos stobs dge ba goms pa'i stobs/ /mi brtan pa dang brtan 'byung ba zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal snga nas rkyen bzhi dang/ stobs bzhi gsungs
109b6(mdo 'grel): so/ /rkyen bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang/ phan yon mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus su sems bskyed pa dang/ sems can sdug pa mthong nas sems bskyed pa'o//
109b7(mdo 'grel): stobs bzhi ni rgyu'i stobs dang/ sbyor ba'i stobs dang/ rang gi stobs dang/ gzhan gyi stobs so/ /de ltar rgyu dang rkyen nye bar tshogs pa na byang chub kyi sems nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i ngo bo ni/ 'dun pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ smon pa ni rnam
110a1(mdo 'grel): grangs so/ /ji skad du 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas/ sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod ces gsungs so/ /'dun pa dang snying rje dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi
110a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa yul khyad par can la dmigs pa ni ngo bo ste/ dkar po'i chos kyi lo tog ma lus pa bskyed pa'i sa gzhi bzang po lta bu ste/ 'dun bas lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems so/ /rnam pa de nyid kyi khyad par ram/ bye brag ste/ g.yo
110a3(mdo 'grel): sgyu la sogs pa'i skyon gang gis kyang ma gos shing dri ma med pa ste/ dper na gser bzang po g.ya' dang rdo dang sa la sogs pa'i skyon med pa lta bu ste/ sems de nyid bsam pa bzang po gser lta bu'o/ /de'i don rgyas par 'phags
110a4(mdo 'grel): pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems de ni ji lta bu'i rnam par sems bskyed pa yin/ smras pa rigs kyi bu sems de ni theg pa dman pa dang ma 'dres pas gtsang ba'i rnam par skyes so
110a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so/ /de sbyang ba ni sems de dang po gang nas kyang ma 'ongs shing/ tha ma gar yang mi 'gro ba gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ kha dog med pa/ dbyibs med pa/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa/ tha
110a6(mdo 'grel): mar mi 'gag pa/ rang bzhin gyi stong pa/ 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yang nas yang du dran par bya'o/ /yang na byams pa dang/ snying rje byang chub kyi sems de goms pas bstan par bya ba dang/ shin tu byang bar bya ste/ sems kyi skad
110a7(mdo 'grel): cig re re la dran pa rgyu chags su bya ba dang/ dran pa dang shes bzhin dang/ tshul bzhin du sems pa dang/ bag yod pas gnas par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems gzungs ni sems can mi btang ba bzhi dang/ skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par
110b1(mdo 'grel): rtog pa brgyad dang nang gi thabs la mkhas pa bcu dang/ phyi'i thabs la mkhas pa drug dang/ bdag dang gzhan brje ba dang/ bdag dang gzhan mnyam par bya ba dang/ 'phags pa bzang spyod dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba chen po bcu la sogs pa
110b2(mdo 'grel): gdab ba/ /de la sems can mi gtang ba ni bdag la phan 'dags pa'i sems mi gtang ba dang/ bdag la gnod pa byed pa mi gtang ba dang/ dngos su sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu sogs ma gtang ba dang/ spyir sems can mi gtang
110b3(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /de la bdag la phan 'dogs pa mi gtang ba ni/ drin shes shing drin gzo ba'i sems kyis mi btang pa ste/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /nyon mongs mi yis gdungs pa yis/ /sring ba'i btson ra'i nang
110b4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa/ /sems can gang yin de dag sngon/ /pha ma mdza' bshes rtsa lag tu/ /gyur cing phan chen btags pas na/ /byas pa gzo ba nyid du bya/ /'di dag bdag gis sdug bsngal byas/ /da ni bde bar bya ba'i rigs zhes gsungs so/ /'di'i don rgyas
110b5(mdo 'grel): par mdo sder blta bar bya'o/ /skye ba 'di'i pha ma dang gnyen 'dun dang/ grogs la sogs pa bdag la phan 'dogs pa la drin shes shing drin gzo ba bya dgos te/ de ltar ma gyur na/ byas la lan du phan mi 'dags zhes pa'i nyes byas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur
110b6(mdo 'grel): ro/ /bdag la gnod pa byed pa'i sems can mi btang ba ni/ las bdag gir byed pa'i sems kyi mi gtang ste/ ji skad du/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi skyes mchog ni/ /legs kyi lan ni legs kyis ldon/ /nyes kyi lan yang legs kyis ldon/ zhes dang/ yum
110b7(mdo 'grel): brgyad stong pa las kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol pas nyes pa byas kyang/ de dang rtsod pa mi byed par de la gnod pa dang sems 'khrug par mi bya'o/ /gal te gsod na yang de la zhe sdang bar mi bya'o/ /sems can su la yang zhe sdang bar mi bya'o/ /
111a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni brtan par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo'i 'du shes bya'o/ /rang nyid bde
111a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod pa ltar sems can gzhan yang bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sems can ma lus pa sdug bsngal ba las thar bar bya'o/ /sems can gang yang mi gtang ngo/ /de dag gis bdag gi lus dum bu brgyar gtubs kyang de dag la gnod sems mi bya
111a3(mdo 'grel): bar byams pa dang snying rje bskyed do/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ rje btsun Arya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyang/ gnod pa drag po byung ba na/ /sngon gyi las su shes par bya zhes gsungs so/ /gal te de ltar ma gyur na/ /gzhan gyi bshags kyang mi nyan par/ /khros
111a4(mdo 'grel): nas gzhan la 'tshog pa dang/ /pha rol bshad kyis 'chags pa spong/ /khros pa rnams ni yal bar 'jog /gshe la lan du gshe la sogs/ /zhes pa'i pham pa dang nyes byas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos su sdug bsngal ba'i sems can mi btang
111a5(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ tsha ba dang grang ba dang/ bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa dang/ mtsham med pa la sogs pa dang/ bslab pa nyams pa dang/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi gdungs pa mthong na snying rje'i sems kyis mi gtang ste/ rje btsun Arya de ba'i zhal nas/
111a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ /lcags byas mgo la 'khor ba dang/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed ma thag /med par 'gyur ces thos pa yin zhes gsungs pa dang/ slob dpon dpa' bo'i zhal nas kyang/ /na ba'i bu la khyad par du/ /ma ni gdung pa
111a7(mdo 'grel): skye ba ltar/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /dam pa min la khyad par brtse zhes gsungs pa dang/ slob dpon pa bya'i zhal nas kyang/ sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa yi/ /sdug bsngal can dag mthong ba'i tshe/ /snying rje rus pa'i gting nas
111b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /skye zhing de la phan par byed ces gsungs te/ rgyas par mdo sder blta bar bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la sogs pa'i sems can ni/ snying brtse ba'i sems kyis mi gtang ste/ bslab pa nyams pa dang/ mtshams med byed pa dang/ srog gcod pa dang/ sdig
111b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i las sna tshogs byed pa de dag las bzlog par bya ste/ ji skad du 'phags pa dran pa nyer gzhag las/ gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang mnos nas/ /legs par bsrung bar mi byed pa/ /de ni nges par sha dang rus/ /'jig pa'i me mar mur du sreg ces gsungs
111b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'phags pa rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba mthong nas ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur ces/ /mchi ma rab tu 'byung bar bya/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ 'jig rten na ni sems can gang/ /rtag
111b4(mdo 'grel): tu sdig pa byed 'dod pa/ /rtag tu de dag thams cad ni/ /gnod pa med par bzlog gyur cig ces gsungs so/ /spyir sems can mi btang ba ni byams pa'i sems kyi mi gtang ba dang/ 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyi mdo las byang chub sems dpa' 
111b5(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du blta bar bya ba dang/ rang gis lus bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ mdo sde rgyan las kyang/ ji ltar phu ron rang gi bu mchog byams/ /rang gi bu de nye bar 'khyung nas 'dug /de bzhin sdug bsngal ba yi
111b6(mdo 'grel): sems can la/ /brtse bcas byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'dra/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po las kyang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bde ma chags/ /rang gi sdug bsngal dag gis mi mjed kyang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal
111b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /gzhan bden ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' / /zhes gsungs pa dang/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyu dang/ dpal mchog dang po las kyang/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog gnas par gyur pa na/ /de srid mtshungs
112a1(mdo 'grel): med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus zhes gsungs te/ /rgyas par mdo sder blta bar bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad po ni/ kyi hud nam zhig na bdag gis sems can gyi skye ba'i
112a2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal med par byed nus par gyur zhig gu /de bzhin du rgas ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ na ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal med par 'gyur zhig gu /sems can ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol bar byed nus par 'gyur/ ma sgrol ba rnams
112a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbugs ma phyin ba rnams dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams nam zhig mya ngan las zlo nus par 'gyur zhig gu snyam skad cig re re la dran pa rgyun chags su bya'o/ /nang gi thabs la mkhas pa ni gzhan sdug bsngal bdag
112a4(mdo 'grel): gir byed pa dang/ bdag gi sdug bsngal gyis gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba dang/ bdag gi bde ba dang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal brje ba dang/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis bdag dus rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa ste/ ji skad du rig pa
112a5(mdo 'grel): mchog gi rgyud chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bde ba de ma chags/ /rang gi sdug bsngal dag gis mi mjed kyang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal dag gis sems sdug bsngal/ /gzhan bde na ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' / /zhes gsungs
112a6(mdo 'grel): so/ /gzhan gyi sdig pa bdag gi sdig par byas nas bshags pa dang/ gzhan gyi dge ba bdag gi dge bar byas nas yi rang ba dang/ bdag gi dge ba gzhan gyi dge bar byas nas yi rang ba dang/ gzhan gyi dge ba bdag gi dge bar byas nas yongs
112a7(mdo 'grel): su bsngo ba'o/ /phyi'i thabs la mkhas pa ni bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang/ rig pa'i gnas lnga dang/ mkhas pa bcu dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pas sems can ma lus pa smin par byed de/ rjes su bzung ba dang/
112b1(mdo 'grel): tshar bcad pa dang/ brid pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ rtsigs la dbab ba dang/ rngan pas rngan pa'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi bsngo ba bcu pa dang/ bzang po spyod pa dang/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i smon lam nyi shu ba dang/ ba tshwa chu klung nas 'byung
112b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig pa la sogs pas sems can mi gtang bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las/ srog gi phyir yang brdzun mi smra ba dang/ sems can la g.yo sgyu med pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par bya ba dang/
112b3(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed pa'i gang zag la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ sems can gang dag smin par byed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por smin par byed kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ma yin pa'o/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan
112b4(mdo 'grel): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa las kyang/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed ma thag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos bdun la bslab par bya ba ste/ rnam par rtog pas kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi bya na dbang po gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba lta smos kyang ci
